Name: Balance Breakers - A Battle Party Game
About the game: Team up and be the Balance Breakers! Balance Breakers is an easy to learn battle-based party game for 1-4 players. Selecting different Breakers, players have to dodge the attacks from the bosses, kick the opponent off the arena and collect most treasures to claim the victory. Let’s Break the Balance! Bosses dominating the land are defending everyone to take their treasures. They will use specific skills to kick you off the arena and take back their treasures. Find the chance to hit them hard and make them explode! Choose you Breaker and get each others’ backs! Breakers with special weapons and skills ally to fight for their team. Wombo combo with other breakers to kick other opponents away from the victory. For the glory...For the treasure! Epic battles with chaotic co-op! Overwhelming missions and action awaits you on the battleground. Collecting treasures, kicking off enemies, dodging the boss, clearing obstacles, returning the coins, etc. are happening at the same time. Stick with your team to co-op and work out the fights. Features: Fancy graphics come with epic battles Simple to control, easy to learn and fun to watch Bosses with unique skills and mechanics on every different maps Breakers with special Dash and Skills can be chosen Team Battle: for classic team match Rumble Arena: for a chaotic fighting challenge Included in game: a 10 mins introduction animation!
